ygData.subject: High lvl bard song missed notes
ygData.msgSnippet: I am definatly getting less missed notes on the lvl 48 and lvl 50 songs. These where a pain in the ass before, missing more often than not. Now i can start
ygData.messageBody:
I am definatly getting less missed notes on the lvl 48 and lvl 50 songs.
These where a pain in the ass before, missing more often than not. Now i
can start them up and they get about the same number of missed notes as the
other songs it seems, which is great news.

At 11:03 AM 10/14/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
>Strange, I was thinking it was odd over the last 2 days (even before the
>patch) that I seemed to be getting MORE missed notes in general on all my
>songs that I usually do. I can't really think of anything to attribute this
>to logically but I definitely did not notice less missed notes :-(
>
>-Faras
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
>> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
>> Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 10:52 AM
>> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch downtime again this morning (Thursday)
>>
>>
>> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>>
>> i tried fufil's also (did not try either tuyen's song) and
>> all i got was 3
>> ticks of 10dmg and -14 magic resistance. no change with
>> mistmoore battle
>> drum. from what i remember this is exactly what it was
>> pre-patch. oh well.
>> along with that and no breastplate a pretty disappointing day.
>>
>> Oh, I almost forgot too... anyone notice less missed notes?
>> i started,
>> stopped, and restarted the level 50 song 10 times with no
>> missed notes. i
>> was only confirming what another 50 bard noticed. that would
>> be impossible
>> pre-patch, that song missed notes more than not. so one good
>> thing at least
>>
>> Shada
>>>
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
>the subject lol.
